nl.tue.teamwork.datamanagement
Class BrokerFactory

java.lang.Object
  nl.tue.teamwork.datamanagement.BrokerFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLBrokerFactory
public abstract class BrokerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Title: TeamWorkFlow

Description: This is the abstract class. When writing brokers for a new data warehouse, this class should be overwritten. All methods of this class retun a null value.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006

Company: TU/e
